quotes.quote: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.
quotes.speaker: B. B. King

quotes.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.speaker: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Study hard what interests you the most in the most undisciplined, irreverent and original manner possible.
quotes.speaker: Richard Feynman

quotes.quote: If you're not prepared to be wrong, you'll never come up with anything original.
quotes.speaker: Sir Ken Robinson
